dct_title_s: Plan of an American country town
dct_description_sm: Abstract: Pages 61 and 62 of the February 1770 issue of The Gentleman's magazine, including a map submitted by "J.P." showing a proposal for the layout of a town accommodating 176 families in the North American colonies, and accompanying text.
Notes: Includes text describing the map (both sides).
